name: Jellyfin Ratings
overview: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.

versions.name: Jellyfin Ratings
versions.description: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.

versions.name: Jellyfin Ratings (Stable Build)
versions.description: Fixes the icon URL, switches to a secure NuGet feed, and stabilizes the build process.
